name: Kirby: Vs. Angel
description:
Kirby is put up against an extremely dangerous foe like he has never battled before! He only has his powered-up love-love stick to help him win, and this monster is classified as an omega-level threat. Will kirby be able to prevail?

Credits to Mossmandaynight for the base template! (Vs. Zero DX)

On Scratch: https://turbowarp.org/819271889?interpolate
